trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> objects used by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> to override the default way it serializes a class.
trans-unit.target: Representa una colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" />, que <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> utiliza para reemplazar la forma predeterminada en que serializa una clase.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes> is returned by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlElements%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes> devuelto por la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlElements%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> clase.

trans-unit.source: By using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> class and the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> class, you can override the default way that the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a class.
trans-unit.target: Mediante el uso de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> clase y la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> (clase), puede invalidar el valor predeterminado que el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> se serializa una clase.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes the `Transportation` class, which contains a single field named `Vehicles` that returns an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente ejemplo se serializa la `Transportation` (clase), que contiene un solo campo denominado `Vehicles` que devuelve un <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.

trans-unit.source: The example first applies two instances of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> class to the `Vehicles` field that specifies the types of objects the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> inserts into the array.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo aplican primero dos instancias de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> clase a la `Vehicles` campo que especifica los tipos de objetos del <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> inserta en la matriz.

trans-unit.source: The example then creates two <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> objects to override the behavior of the attributes applied to the `Vehicles` property.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo crea dos <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> objetos que se va a invalidar el comportamiento de los atributos aplicados a la `Vehicles` propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The two overriding objects are added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes> collection of an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: Los dos objetos reemplazo se agregan a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes> colección de un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>.

trans-unit.source: Lastly, the example adds the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>, allowing the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to insert the new object types into the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> returned by the `Vehicles` field.
trans-unit.target: Por último, en el ejemplo se agrega el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> a una <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>, lo cual permite la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> para insertar los nuevos tipos de objeto en el <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> devuelto por la `Vehicles` campo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> que se va a agregar.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> a la colección.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the newly added item.
trans-unit.target: Índice de base cero del elemento que acaba de agregarse.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates two <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> objects and calls the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes.Add%2A> method to add them to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea dos <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> objetos y llamadas a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes.Add%2A> método para agregarlos a un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes>.

trans-unit.source: The example then adds the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes> to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>, which is used to create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that can serialize an instance of the `Transportation` class.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo, a continuación, agrega el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes> a una <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>, que se usa para crear un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> que puede serializar una instancia de la `Transportation` clase.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> to look for.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> que se va a buscar.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the collection contains the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Determina si la colección contiene el objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object exists in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el objeto existe en la colección; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> array to hold the copied elements.
trans-unit.target: La matriz de <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> para contener los elementos copiados.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Índice de base cero de <c>array</c> donde comienza la copia.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes" />, or a portion of it to a one-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: Copia <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes" /> o una parte de la misma en una matriz unidimensional.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> whose index is being retrieved.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> cuyo índice se recupera.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el índice del objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: Índice de base cero de <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index where the member is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Índice de base cero en el que se inserta el miembro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> to insert.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> que se va a insertar.

trans-unit.source: Inserts an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Inserta <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> en la colección.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
trans-unit.target: Índice de base cero del elemento que se va a obtener o establecer.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el elemento en el índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Elemento en el índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is not a valid index in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> no es un índice válido para <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: The property is set and the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad está establecida y <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes" /> es de solo lectura.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> que se va a quitar de la colección.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quita el objeto especificado de la colección.
